thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TransferWise | transferwise.com | 17 of 1794
thread.title: Patrick Lombardo

author: Patrick Lombardo
title: Patrick Lombardo
text: I was a little skeptical at first, but I used TransferWise to transfer money from from my American bank account to my French one. I was very pleased with the speed of the service; I was originally Quote: d a week for transfer time but my money came and was available in less than three days. The process of requesting the transfer was also very quick and painless. Overall I would highly recommend this service.
